ai-tha-ap98:1.1_0: “I used to have a small sea
ai-tha-ap98:1.2_0: “In the wilderness, I’m sitting in the wilderness,
ai-tha-ap98:3.1_0: it is like the In front of the Buddha:
ai-tha-ap98:3.2_0: for the sake of the world.
ai-tha-ap98:3.3_0: and worshipped him with the tail.
ai-tha-ap98:3.4_0: with the passing away I have died there,
ai-tha-ap98:4.3_0: I’m not aware of any living being
ai-tha-ap98:5.2_0: The Kings were delighted with the King’s joy.
ai-tha-ap98:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Tissa.
